Interview with Ken Auer

Description: Ken Auer is one of the pioneers of what we now call “Software Craftsmanship”. He was mentoring and practicing the techniques that were eventually described as XP long before these concepts were even getting acknowledged by Dr. Dobbs.
Published: Jan 07, 2022
